name: Spicy Chicken with Couscous
instructions: Season chicken breasts with chili flakes, cumin, salt, and pepper. Heat olive oil in a pan and cook chicken for 6-7 minutes on each side. In a separate pot, prepare couscous according to package instructions. Sauté bell peppers and onions. Serve chicken over couscous with sautéed vegetables.

name: Chicken Curry Gyros
instructions: Season chicken with curry powder, salt, and pepper. Cook in a pan with olive oil until golden. Mix Greek yogurt, lemon juice, salt, and pepper for the sauce. Assemble gyros by placing chicken, cucumber, and sauce in pita bread.

name: Naked Chicken Burrito Bowl
instructions: Cook chicken breasts in a pan and slice them. Prepare brown rice according to package instructions. Layer rice, beans, corn, and chicken in a bowl. Top with salsa, avocado, cilantro, and lime juice.

name: Zingy Chicken Burger
instructions: Cook chicken patties in a pan or grill. Mix mayonnaise, hot sauce, and lemon zest to create a zingy sauce. Assemble burgers with chicken patty, tomato slices, lettuce, and sauce.

name: Easy Pesto Chicken & Veg
instructions: Season chicken with salt and pepper, cook in a pan. In another pan, sauté zucchini and bell pepper. Toss chicken and vegetables with pesto and serve.

name: Creamy Lemon & Thyme Chicken
instructions: Cook chicken in a pan with olive oil. Add cream, lemon zest, lemon juice, and thyme to the pan, cooking for 5 more minutes until sauce thickens. Serve with rice or vegetables.

name: Creamy Cajun Chicken Pasta
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions. Season chicken with Cajun seasoning and cook in a pan. Add bell peppers, cream, and Parmesan, mixing until smooth. Combine with pasta and serve.

name: Buffalo Chicken Pasta Salad
instructions: Cook pasta and chicken separately. Slice the chicken and toss with buffalo sauce. Combine pasta, chicken, celery, and ranch dressing. Top with blue cheese crumbles.

name: 30-Minute Chicken Tikka Masala
instructions: Cook chicken with tikka masala paste until browned. Add tomato sauce and simmer for 10 minutes. Stir in cream and cook until smooth. Serve with basmati rice.

name: One-Pot Creamy Garlic Chicken & Rice
instructions: Sauté chicken and garlic in a pot. Add rice, chicken broth, and cream. Simmer for 20 minutes until rice is cooked. Garnish with parsley and serve.

name: Teriyaki Chicken Bowl
instructions: Cook chicken and slice. Prepare rice and steam broccoli and carrots. Toss chicken with teriyaki sauce and serve over rice with vegetables. Garnish with sesame seeds.
